name: Bread and Games
description:
Bread and Games is a top-down-perspective action game for two players.

The game features two mechanically different characters and players are advised to find out the best way to survive by experimentation with several mechanics.

It was my 4th semester project and my first one with a team of 10 talented and dedicated people.

The development time for this project was 4 weeks.

XInput compatible controllers are recommended and needed to play

Controls Melee (Player 1) Left Punch - LB Right Punch - RB (hold to charge) Rotate Shield - Right Stick Move - Left Stick Revive Partner - Y Shooter (Player 2) Shoot Rifle - RB Shoot Scatter Gun - LB Aim - Right Stick Move - Left Stick Reload - X Revive Partner - Y
